item.title: [PI] fishing spots
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“mc wobbla, post:10, topic:465351”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=570386.msg4133206#msg4133206 date=1351381320]

Use common sense?

what do you mean? adding the item id to c.fishies2 = 0; ?
that adds a second fish to be caught from the net

I fixed it anyways. just changed npc id to a different one that already had sharks

do you really think 0 is a fish id?
like arham said, use some common sense
the code is in front of your nose you just have to change the fish id to your new fish id

That fish id is for shrimps. I couldn’t find how to change the tuna/swordfish one…

So shrimps are 0? I never knew that…
[/quote]

Did you even read the code? -.- shrimps are 317…[/quote]
Was it not sarcasm?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] fishing spots
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

so this is my code for one of my fishing spots. net/harpoon. Currently, it’ll fish shrimps (net) tuna/swordifsh(harpoon). I don’t care about shrimps, but how do i get it to fish sharks instead of tuna/swordfish?

case 334: c.fishing = true; c.fishXP = 350; c.fishies = 317; c.fishreqt = 0; c.fishitem = 303; c.fishemote = 621; c.fishies2 = 0; c.fishreq2 = 0; break;

Read full topic
